block.mekanismgenerators.saturating_cond: Bộ ngưng tụ hơi bão hòa
block.mekanismgenerators.turbine_vent: Cửa thông hơi cho tuốc bin
container.mekanismgenerators.turbine_ven: Cửa thông hơi cho tuốc bin
description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: Thiết bị sản xuất điện bằng cách hấp thụ trực tiếp ánh sáng mặt trời với hao phí thấp.
description.mekanismgenerators.bio_gener: Thiết bị sản xuất năng lượng bằng cách đốt vật liệu hữu cơ.
description.mekanismgenerators.control_r: A collection of control rods used to halt a fission chain reaction. Placed on top of a tower of Fission Fuel Assemblies.
description.mekanismgenerators.electroma: Thiết bị chuyển đổi cơ năng từ Cơ cấu tổ hợp quay thành điện năng, được đặt theo thứ tự bất kỳ phía trên cơ cấu tổ hợp quay sao cho các khối được đặt cạnh nhau và có một mặt tiếp xúc với khối tổ hợp quay.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_f: A cluster of fuel rods used to house fission fuel within a Fission Reactor. These can be stacked on top of each other.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r: Lead-infused steel casing used to create a Fission Reactor. Mostly heat-resistant, mostly radiation-resistant, and mostly safe!
A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with redstone.
A port which can be placed on a Fission Reactor multiblock to transfer coolant, fuel, and waste.
description.mekanismgenerators.fusion_re: The controlling block for the entire Fusion Reactor structure.
Reinforced framing that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
A block that can be used to allow basic monitoring of a reactor using redstone.
A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: Thiết bị tạo ra năng lượng bằng cách sử dụng các loại khí khác nhau.
description.mekanismgenerators.heat_gene: Thiết bị sử dụng nguồn nhiệt từ dung nham hoặc các vật liệu dễ cháy để tạo năng lượng.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: Activate the reactor when powered, and deactivate when unpowered
The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
Output when the reactor reaches critical damage levels (100%+).
The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Will not emit a redstone signal
Output when the reactor has excess waste
Reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
Output when the reactor reaches dangerous temperatures
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.mekanismgenerators.rotationa: A connector that is placed on the highest Turbine Rotor of an Industrial Turbine to carry kinetic energy into its Electromagnetic Coils.
description.mekanismgenerators.saturatin: A block that condenses steam processed by an Industrial Turbine into reusable water. These can be placed in any arrangement above your rotational complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_gen: A generator that uses the power of the sun to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_c: Pressure-resistant casing used in the creation of an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_r: Trục thép dùng để đỡ cánh tuốc bin trong Tuốc bin công nghiệp.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_v: Một loại vỏ của tuốc bin có kèm chức năng truyền tải hơi và năng lượng.
A type of Turbine Casing with an integrated vent for the release of steam. These should be placed on the level of or above the turbine's Rotational Complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.wind_gene: Thiết bị này sử dụng sức gió để tạo năng lượng với hiệu suất cao.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, improper placement for Control Rod Assembly at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_f: Couldn't form, invalid fuel assembly structure present.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_extra: Couldn't form, found extra Control Rod Assembly at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, invalid Fission Fuel Assembly placement at %s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no fuel assembly structures present.
Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to: %s.
reactor.mekanismgenerators.logic.toggle_: Chuyển chế độ đo công suất làm mát
reactor.mekanismgenerators.stats.ignitio: Nhiệt độ kích hoạt phản ứng: %s
reactor.mekanismgenerators.stats.min_inj: Tốc độ châm nhiên liệu cực tiểu: %s
tooltip.mekanismgenerators.hohlraum.read: Sẵn sàng kích hoạt phản ứng!
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Rotational Complex at %s. Complex must be centered above Turbine Rotors.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r: Couldn't form, found invalid Turbine Rotor at %s. Turbine Rotors must be centered below Rotational Complex.
Couldn't form, invalid Turbine Rotor arrangement.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_conde: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Saturating Condenser at %s. Saturating Condensers must be above Pressure Disperser layer.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_even_: Couldn't form, width and length of structure must be odd.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, Electromagnetic Coil arrangement is malformed. Coils must be connected to Rotational Complex and adjacently connected.
Couldn't form, Pressure Disperser arrangement is malformed. Dispersers must create complete horizontal layer surrounding Rotational Complex.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no Rotational Complex present.
Couldn't form, expected but didn't find Pressure Disperser at %s.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_too_n: Couldn't form, structure is too narrow to support turbine size.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_vent_: Couldn't form, found a Turbine Vent below Pressure Disperser layer. Vents must be at or above vertical position of disperser layer.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.stats.max_wat: Lưu lượng nước cực đại: %s mB/t
